page.title: 06HOUSING IN DITTON PRIORS
page.content:
{TYPE OF HOUSES. AGE OF HOUSES. Bungalow { 28%. }0-10. {26%. Detatched{ 29%. }11-50. {39%. Semi-Detatched.{29%.} 51-100{ 16%. Terraced. { 5%. }101-200. {5%. Farm. {2%. }OVER 200. {14%. Other. { 6%. { {VILLAGE SIZE. {21%}of people think that the village should grow{larger. {79% }of people think that the village should stay the same size. {NUMBER OF PEOPLE IN EACH HOUSE.} 1.15% 2.32% 3.17% 4.23% 5.8% 6.2%
Recently{new houses}have been built like the 7 old peoples terraced bungalows.There are also barn conversions being carried.50 houses are being built over a 10 year period. The main sewers were conected in 1985.
